metadata.name: Suspicious Scheduled Task Creation Involving Temp Folder
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks that involves a temporary folder and runs only once

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /create ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /sc once ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temp\\')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks that involves a temporary folder and runs only once

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Administrative activity 2. Software installation Reference: https://discuss.elastic.co/t/detection-and-response-for-hafnium-activity/266289/3
